tool_description: This API generate dummy text in Myanmar language.
name: Myanmar Dummy Text
title: Myanmar Dummy Text

api_list.name: Myanmar Dummy Text
api_list.description: Myanmar Lorem Ipsum Dummy Text Generator

optional_parameters.name: context
optional_parameters.description: options are 'sport' and 'general'. Default value is 'sport'

optional_parameters.name: encoding
optional_parameters.description: options are 'zg' and 'uni' . Default value is 'zg'

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: options are 'plain' and 'html'. Default value is 'plain'

optional_parameters.name: max_sentence
optional_parameters.description: maximum number of sentence per paragraph. Default value is 6

optional_parameters.name: min_sentence
optional_parameters.description: minimum number of sentence per paragraph. Default value is 2

optional_parameters.name: number_of_paragraph
optional_parameters.description: number of paragraph. Default value is 4

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mmldev-myanmar-dummy-text-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/para4/min2/sport/max6/plain/zg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mmldev-myanmar-dummy-text-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mmldev-myanmar-dummy-text-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/para{number_of_paragraph}/min{min_sentence}/{context}/max{max_sentence}/{format}/{encoding}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mmldev-myanmar-dummy-text-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
